name: createManagedAccount
description: Create a new managed account owned by the authenticated user. You need to be explictly approved by Telnyx in order to become a manager account.

body.description: Parameters that define the managed account to be created

$ul: **api_key**: The managed account's V2 API access key
**api_token**: The managed account's V1 API token
**api_user**: The manager account's email, which serves as the V1 API user identifier
**available_credit**: Available amount to spend (balance + credit limit)
**record_type**: Identifies the type of the resource.
**created_at**: ISO 8601 formatted date indicating when the resource was created.
**manager_account_id**: The ID of the manager account associated with the managed account.
**organization_name**: The organization the managed account is associated with.
**record_type**: Identifies the type of the resource.
**updated_at**: ISO 8601 formatted date indicating when the resource was updated.
